info.longBusinessSummary: Ellomay Capital Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the initiation, development, construction, and production of renewable and clean energy projects in Europe, the United States, and Israel. It owns photovoltaic (PV) plants comprising five PV plants in Spain. The company also engages in the operation of a dual-fuel operated power plant in Ashkelon, Israel; and construction of a hydro power plant in the Manara Cliff, Israel. In addition, it operates anaerobic digestion plants. The company was formerly known as NUR Macroprinters Ltd. and changed its name to Ellomay Capital Ltd. in April 2008. Ellomay Capital Ltd. was incorporated in 1987 and is headquartered in Tel Aviv, Israel.
